alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 09 at 3:18AM EDT until April 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...CRITICALLY LOW HUMIDITY WITH GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH ERC WILL RESULT IN ELEVATED FIRE DANGER TODAY... .Breezy west to northwest winds with low fuel moisture will create Red Flag conditions for a few hours this afternoon as relative humidity values drop below 35 percent. . ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HIGH ERC VALUES... The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Area - Ruskin FL has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Polk...Hardee...Highlands...DeSoto. * WIND...West to southwest 15 to 20 mph with gust up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...30 to 35 percent * ERC...29 to 32 * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
